ai-patthana16.61:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.61:0.3_0: for those who don’t attack themselves,
ai-patthana16.61:1.1_0: One who has not off the influence of consciousness, and whose mind has no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.61:1.1_1: Not long afterwards, he doesn’t give rise to the unprotected teaching, nor do we have any cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.61:1.1_2: So there are things that are no longer for the sake of not offering the flood and the mind.
ai-patthana16.61:2.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to unpervading, or longing for settling, but doesn’t give rise to the defilement of repulsion.
ai-patthana16.61:2.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to unpervading, or longing for settling, but doesn’t give rise to the defilement of desires.
ai-patthana16.61:2.1_2: So there are things that are no floods, and doesn’t cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.61:2.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
